scripts.bundle:ios: react-native bundle --platform ios --entry-file index.js --bundle-output build/index.ios.bundle --assets-dest build
scripts.make-apk: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd ..
scripts.bundle:android: react-native bundle --platform android --entry-file index.js --bundle-output build/index.android.bundle --assets-dest build
scripts.webpack-bundle:ios: react-native webpack-bundle --platform ios --bundle-output build/index.ios.bundle --entry-file index.js --assets-dest ios
